es.um.redes.P2P.PeerTracker.Message

Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.um.redes.P2P.PeerTracker.Message.Message
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MessageControl, MessageDataFileInfo, MessageDataSeedInfo

    public abstract class Message
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class that models peer-tracker messages without a specific format
